name: Google Chronicle
description: This plugin is used to deliver alerts (DLP, Malware, Policy, Compromised Credential, Malsite, Quarantine, Remediation, Security Assessment, Watchlist, UBA, CTEP, Anomaly, Legal Hold) and events (Page, Application, Audit, Infrastructure, Network, Incident) data to Google Chronicle platform. The plugin supports sharing of UDM and JSON formatted data. The required API keys are linked to customers and are provided by your Google Chronicle representative.

configuration.label: Region
configuration.description: Region where your Chronicle customer account is provisioned.

configuration.label: Custom Region URL
configuration.description: Enter a custom region base URL if you've selected Custom Region for the value of Region.

configuration.label: Customer ID
configuration.description: Unique identifier (UUID) corresponding to a particular Chronicle instance. Provided by your Chronicle representative.

configuration.label: Log Source Identifier
configuration.description: This will be added as namespace to all the JSON formatted data. The log source identifier should not contain whitespaces.
